mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPNO, A.HNAME, CASE WHEN A.T_SEX = '2' THEN 'F' ELSE 'M' END AS T_SEX, CASE WHEN A.PLACE IN ('SK06','SK10','SK07','SK85') THEN 'SK06' WHEN A.PLACE IN ('SK09','SK18') THEN 'SK09' ELSE 'SK01' END PLACE, B.AUTH_CODE, B.BLD_CODE, IFNULL(A.HRS_AGREE, 'N') as HRS_AGREE FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV A LEFT JOIN CHARGER B ON A.EMPNO = B.EMPNO WHERE A.EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.update: UPDATE INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV SET HRS_AGREE = 'Y', AGREE_DT = now() WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
